sentences.sContent: Satisfied, sun-warmed, we sprawl in the grass and watch our kites cavort.
sentences.sContent_eng: Satisfied, sun-warmed, we sprawl in the grass and watch our kites cavort.
sentences.sCn: 阳光和煦，我们心满意足地趴在草丛里，看风筝在天上欢跃。

remMethod.val: “渴望他” → 兴奋得跳跃 → 欢跃

trans.tranOther: to jump or dance around in a playful or sexual way
